snippet: Yemen’s Interior Ministry said that the vessel carrying the migrants sank on Sunday in rough seas off the southern coastal city of Al Mukha.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency reports that at least 21 migrants from Ethiopia drowned while trying to reach coast of Yemen.
lead_paragraph: Yemen’s Interior Ministry said that the vessel carrying the migrants sank on Sunday in rough seas off the southern coastal city of Al Mukha.

headline.main: Shipwreck Kills Over a Dozen Ethiopian Migrants Trying to Reach Yemen
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Migrants Die When Ship Sinks

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
